getAllReporters

public List<NotificationServerSettings> getAllReporters()
Get a list of all reporters stored in the data store

Returns:
A list of all reporters in the data store; the list may be empty, but not null

getHandlers

public List<NotificationServerSettings> getHandlers(String event)
Get all the registered handlers for a given event

Parameters:
event - A description of the event
Returns:
A list of all handlers for the given event description

registerHandlers

public void registerHandlers(String event,
                             List<NotificationServerSettings> handlers)
Register the given handlers for the given event

Parameters:
event - The event name to attach the handlers to
handlers - The list of handlers to attach to the given event

removeHandlers

public void removeHandlers(String event,
                           List<NotificationServerSettings> handlers)
Remove the given handlers from the given event

Parameters:
event - The event name to detach the handlers from
handlers - The list of handlers to detach from the given event

removeHandlers

public void removeHandlers(List<NotificationServerSettings> handlers)
Remove the handlers from all events; this only removes the links in the data store, it does NOT remove them from the in memory manager, you must also remove them from the manager for events to stop firing to them

Parameters:
handlers - The list of handlers to delete

removeAllHandlers

public void removeAllHandlers(String event)
Remove all handlers from a given event; this only removes them from the data store; active handlers remain active until the handler manager is told otherwise

Parameters:
event - The event for which all handlers should be removed

getRegisteredEvents

public String[] getRegisteredEvents()

getSetting

public String getSetting(String var,
                         String defaultVal)
Retrieve a setting from the data store

Parameters:
var - The name of the setting to get
defaultVal - The default value to return if the setting does not exist in the data store; null is allowed
Returns:
The value of the given setting or defaultVal if the setting is not in the data store

getSetting

public String getSetting(String var)
Get a setting from the data store

Parameters:
var - The setting to get
Returns:
The value of the setting or null if the setting does not exist in the data store

setSetting

public void setSetting(String var,
                       String val)
Store a setting in the data store; replaces the value if the setting name already exists in the data store

Parameters:
var - The name of the setting
val - The value of the setting

getClients

public List<Client> getClients()
Retrieve the collection of all clients stored in the data store

Returns:
A Collection of Client instances; the list may be empty, but not null

Retrieve a client by id

Parameters:

Parameters:
clients - The list of clients to be deleted

registerClient

public boolean registerClient(String id)
Register a new client with SageAlert

Parameters:
id - The client id
Returns:
True if the new client was registered or false if the client already existed in the data store
